'''1.14.4''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on July 19, 2019,<ref name="1.14.4">{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-1-14-4-released|Minecraft Java Edition 1.14.4|July 19, 2019}}</ref> which made minor changes to [[villager]]s and server permissions, and fixed bugs not fixed in [[Java Edition 1.14.3|1.14.3]].<ref name="pre">{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-14-4-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.14.4 Pre-Release 1|July 3, 2019}}</ref> It is not compatible with 1.14.3 servers.

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|debug}}'''
* Added {{cmd|debug report}}.
** Used to get more detailed information while debugging performance, such as lists of [[chunk]]s and [[block entities]] in each dimension.
*** Saves this information as a <samp>.zip</samp> file in the <samp>[[.minecraft]]/debug</samp> folder.

'''<samp>[[server.properties]]</samp>'''
* Added {{code|function-permission-level}} to <samp>server.properties</samp> which controls which permission levels [[Function (Java Edition)|function]]s have.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Added "Ping the human!"

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Suspicious stew]]'''
* Suspicious stews made from [[poppies]] now gives the player [[Night Vision]] instead of [[Speed]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Pillager]]s'''
* Changed arm texture.

'''[[Villager]]s'''
* Now voluntarily pick up items.
* Trades can now be completed more times before locking.
* Now remember their gossip after becoming a zombie villager.
** Gossip about players who converted a [[zombie villager]] now lasts longer.
* Can now work without also restocking at the same time.
** This has no effect other than playing the work sound.
* Improved performance of villager pathfinding.

=== Command format ===
'''Permissions'''
* {{cmd|reload}} and {{cmd|forceload}} are now available to permission level 2.

=== General ===
'''Camera'''
* Removed the camera pivot offset when in first-person view.

'''<samp>[[client.jar]]</samp>'''
* Re-integrated [[Realms]] code into the client, in package <samp>com.mojang.realmsclient.dto</samp>.
* Re-added Realms assets to the client.

'''Performance'''
* Improved general performance.
* Improved [[leaf]] rendering performance.
* Improved chunk loading when traveling at high speeds.

'''[[Realms|Minecraft Realms]]'''
* Removed the "Player Activity" button from the Realms screen.
